Reviews.Content: stayed sebel night mid week seeing ballet opera house hotel close central station travel city easy rate 140 including breakfast 2 parking fair price accommodation hotel recently renovated interior fish tank lobby nice touch stayed deluxe comfortable basic features required including flat screen tv faced albion street 6th floor unfortunately traffic noise outside loud night guess expected location king comfortable hilton sydney stayed weeks ago buffet breakfast morning variety hot cold items recommend hotel price 150 night

Reviews.Title: “Great for a bargain...problably not worth their regular rate...”

Reviews.Content: managed book night sebel surry hills extremely low price 60 dollars website person reccomended little skeptical arriving happy spacious king size bed singles pushed slept expecting staff attention staying below cost friendly helpful request directions paddys market validating parking ticket stay budget probably price price paid definitely probably negative stay stupid 50 credit card validation major hotels habit doing expected putting fifty dollars card dont using card instead seriously dont hotels hotels dont practice illegal rate granted tell check actually takes week bank hotels 50 budget mean 50 worst home soap box sorry vent im theres people agree didnt mention breakfast ive rule breakfast hotel cold buffet breakfast hotel chain simple bowl cereal sets 9 walked corner found cafe pancakes coffee 1450

Reviews.Title: “fine for an overnight stay”
Reviews.Author: patkoaus
Reviews.Content: sebel offering escape special 199 renovated deluxe free overnight parking 2 buffet breakfasts meeting friends dinner city booked 2 booked direct hotel price wotif booking breeze checkin breeze nice roomy friends wasnt nice roomy clean renovated buffet breakfast wide range available wasnt nice coffee convenient criticize renovated reviews hubby left shirt posted cod bit expensive 1250 overall stay

Reviews.Title: “Never Again”
Reviews.Author: psjcdt
Reviews.Content: arrival appeared lovely reception changed nasty odour vent hanging ceiling tiles bathroom windows curtains filthy third bed dirty camp bed queried advised superior budget equivalent manager found manager agreed refund account fro night unable move following day upgraded free charge following day bags moved equivalent trip reception finally decent free breakfast troubles checked questioned refund informed lady manager emailed agoda booked contacted hotel sebel replied saying refund offered am care

Reviews.Title: “Very pleasant place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: 1_TravelAddict_1
Reviews.Content: booked via internet summer special 149 deluxe buffet breakfast impressed staff helpful friendly recently renovated bed comfortable buffet breakfast lots choices hotel faily close lot facilities train station downside swimming pool sauna meant heated water fairly cool spa bubbles quickly sauna wasnt plus seperate swimming pool children lots annoying kids splashing swimming recommed hotel friend stay

Reviews.Content: stayed february 5th attending military tatoo check efficient friendly advice transport moore park special buses running central station 12 blocks easy walk king bed fantastic bathroom spotless generous shower head valet parking extra worth staff friendly helpful bug dining experience 1130 pm 2 meals disappointing looks reheated microwave poorly convenient comfortable clean facing albion street surprisingly quiet stay dining
